name: dp2eq1i
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wceq(cdp2(c0, c1), cdp2(c2, c1)), wceq(c0, c2))

body.origin:
|- wceq(cdp2(c0, c1), cdp2(c2, c1))
-| wceq(c0, c2)
-| wi(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(cdp2(c0, c1), cdp2(c2, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cdp2(c0, c1), cdp2(c2, c1))
-| wceq(c0, c2)
-| wi(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(cdp2(c0, c1), cdp2(c2, c1)))

body.origin: |- wi(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(cdp2(c0, c1), cdp2(c2, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cdp2(c0, c1), cdp2(c2, c1))
-| wceq(c0, c2)

comment: Equality theorem for the decimal expansion constructor. (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 15-May-2015.)
